caption.title: Relative expression (log2 fold change) of triterpene saponin biosynthesis activating regulator-like1 (TSARL1) gene at 1 and 4 days after inoculation with cucumber mosaic virus.
caption.p: The red and blue colors indicates up and down regulation patterns, respectively. Abbreviations are combinations of cultivars (J,Q, or R) and days-post-inoculation (1 or 4). Varieiteis tested were: Jessie (J), QQ74 (Q), and Red Head (R).
